ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR($RecordType.Name = 'Service Support ESR Case',$RecordType.Name='Service Onboarding ESR Case'), OR($UserRole.Name='ESR Audit & Rec Rep',$UserRole.Name='ESR New Case Rep',$UserRole.Name='ESR Calendar Admin',$UserRole.Name='ESR IB/OB Service Center Rep',$UserRole.Name='ESR Inbound Service Center Rep',$UserRole.Name='ESR Outbound Service Center Rep',$UserRole.Name='PIA Agency ESR Supervisor',$UserRole.Name='PIA Agency ESR Specialist'), OR(ISCHANGED(Type),ISCHANGED(Priority)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change the type or priority.
